Trade/Device Name(s): BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B CLIA-Waived Kit
Submitter Information: Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD Diagnostic Systems)
Regulation Name(s): Devices Detecting Influenza A, B, and C Virus Antigens
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of Flu A+B CLIA-Waived Kit with modified Analyzer for enhanced ESD and battery protection
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for direct and qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral nucleoprotein antigens from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs of symptomatic patients, as an aid in diagnosis; not for detection of influenza C antigens.
